# Viktor Petersson

> Tech entrepreneur, security advocate, and host of "Nerding Out with Viktor" podcast. Writing about DevSecOps, cloud architecture, software supply chain security, and building scalable systems. CEO of Screenly.

Viktor Petersson is based in London and has been building and running tech companies for over 15 years. He leads Screenly, the world's first developer-friendly digital signage platform powering over 10,000 screens globally.

## Blog

- [Blog index](https://vpetersson.com/blog/): Technical articles on DevSecOps, cloud architecture, open source, security, remote work, and entrepreneurship
- [RSS feed](https://vpetersson.com/blog/index.xml): Blog RSS feed

## Podcast

- [Nerding Out with Viktor](https://vpetersson.com/podcast/): Video podcast with deep dives into technology, entrepreneurship, and security with industry experts
- [RSS feed](https://podcast.nerdingoutwithviktor.com/podcast_feed.xml): Podcast RSS feed

## Pages

- [About](https://vpetersson.com/about/): Background, experience, speaking engagements, and events
- [Projects](https://vpetersson.com/projects/): Current and past projects including Screenly, Anthias, and open-source work
- [Consulting](https://vpetersson.com/consulting/): DevSecOps and software supply chain security consulting services

- [Sitemap](https://vpetersson.com/sitemap.xml): Full site sitemap
